summary.description:
Today, a bit warmer for the feels like temperature (up 2.9°C) and outside temperature (up 2.2°C) and more moisture-laden rainfall (up 2.1 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 3889 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1799 m), light levels (up 9485 lux), and inside temperature (up 2.3°C) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; the temperature will feel pleasantly warm. Also, extremely heavy humidity levels and winds will be practically absent. Rain showers likely, clouds will occasionally block sunlight, and some sunny spells will occur. Weather could become unsettled.
